quotes.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing. That’s why we recommend it daily.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
quotes.author: Farrah Gray

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank
